title: UPNP Problem
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.9.25
OS & Version: Linux
router: AC1750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router Model No. Archer C7 - Firmware Version: | 3.15.3 Build 180305 Rel.51282n - System Up Time: | 25Â days


#### Expected behaviour

Node should keep syncing and connected to peers

#### Actual behaviour

I saw the following:
`err="retrieved hash chain is invalid: no peers to keep download active"`

then there was no syncing for hours
a restart of the node could start the sync again.

Also saw those in the log:

```
DEBUG[12-28|12:24:07.076] Couldn't add port mapping                proto=tcp extport=30303 intport=30303 interface="UPNP IGDv1-IP1" err="goupnp: SOAP request got HTTP 500 Internal Server Error"
DEBUG[12-28|12:24:07.482] Couldn't add port mapping                proto=udp extport=30303 intport=30303 interface="UPNP IGDv1-IP1" err="goupnp: SOAP request got HTTP 500 Internal Server Error"
```

Also it does not seem that after a 500 here there is a retry attempt which I think should be in place.

maybe related #21370

I only see DAppNode entries (another machine) in the routers UPNP list:

![Selection_340](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/111600/103219591-6eb2f300-491e-11eb-9e78-5a677a5e24c8.png)
